if("${CMAKE_CXX_COMPILER_ID}" STREQUAL "GNU")
    set(CMAKE_CXX_FLAGS "-fPIC")
endif()
file(GLOB_RECURSE srcs CONFIGURE_DEPENDS ./*.cpp ./*.h)
add_library(tinyXML STATIC ${srcs})
set_target_properties(tinyXML PROPERTIES LINKER_LANGUAGE CXX)
target_include_directories(tinyXML PUBLIC "${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}")
